summary.span: 表示從裝載 ASP.NET Web 應用程式的伺服器要求的 .aspx 檔案 (也稱為 Web Forms 頁面)。

span.span: Represents an .aspx file, also known as a Web Forms page, requested from a server that hosts an ASP.NET Web application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是與副檔名的.aspx 檔案相關聯。The class is associated with files that have an .aspx extension. 這些檔案會在執行階段做為編譯物件，並在伺服器記憶體中快取。These files are compiled at run time as objects and cached in server memory. 如果您想要建立 Web Form 網頁使用的程式碼後置技巧，衍生自這個類別。If you want to create a Web Forms page using the code-behind technique, derive from this class. 快速應用程式開發 (RAD) 設計工具，例如 Microsoft Visual Studio 中，會自動使用此模型來建立 Web Form 頁面。Rapid application development (RAD) designers, such as Microsoft Visual Studio, automatically use this model to create Web Forms pages. 物件做為在頁面中，除了可實作的所有伺服器控制項的命名容器介面，或會實作這個介面的控制項的子控制項。The object serves as the naming container for all server controls in a page, except those that implement the interface or are child controls of controls that implement this interface. 類別是做為您的 Web 應用程式的使用者介面，因此應該要確定最佳作法的撰寫安全程式碼和保護應用程式會接著檢查的控制項。The class is a control that acts as the user interface for your Web application, and as such should be scrutinized to make sure best practices for writing secure code and securing applications are followed. 如需這些主題的一般資訊，請參閱[概觀的 Web 應用程式的安全性威脅](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88d61678-f84e-4622-ae80-53128821855a)， [NIB:安全性原則的最佳作法](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d49bc4d5-efb7-4caa-a2fe-e4d3cec63c05)，並[重要的安全性概念](~/docs/standard/security/key-security-concepts.md)。For general information on these topics, see [Overview of Web Application Security Threats](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88d61678-f84e-4622-ae80-53128821855a), [NIB: Security Policy Best Practices](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d49bc4d5-efb7-4caa-a2fe-e4d3cec63c05), and [Key Security Concepts](~/docs/standard/security/key-security-concepts.md). 如需特定資訊，請參閱 < [ 保護標準控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)， [How to:顯示安全的錯誤訊息](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f70ac33-6e11-4e98-ab7d-bae9c0e7eefa)， [How to:防止 Web 應用程式中的指令碼攻擊，藉由套用 HTML 編碼字串](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，並[驗證控制項簡介](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/2e4hd649(v=vs.85))。For more specific information, see [Securing Standard Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Display Safe Error Messages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f70ac33-6e11-4e98-ab7d-bae9c0e7eefa), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Introduction to the Validation Controls](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/2e4hd649(v=vs.85)). ## Examples 含有原始程式碼的 Visual Studio Web site 專案位於本主題隨附了：[下載](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192425)。A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192425). 下列程式碼範例示範如何類別會在程式碼後置頁面模型。The following code example demonstrates how the class is used in the code-behind page model. 請注意，程式碼後置原始程式檔宣告繼承自基底的頁面類別的部分類別。Note that the code-behind source file declares a partial class that inherits from a base page class. 基礎頁面類別可以，也可以是另一個類別衍生自。The base page class can be , or it can be another class that derives from . 此外，要注意的部分類別可讓程式碼後置檔案，其定義為欄位成員時，用以而不需要頁面上定義的控制項。Furthermore, note that the partial class allows the code-behind file to use controls defined on the page without the need to define them as field members. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Page_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page_Overview/cs/pageexample.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Page_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page_Overview/vb/pageexample.aspx.vb#2)] 下列程式碼範例會顯示對應到上述的程式碼後置原始程式檔的.aspx 檔案。The following code example shows the .aspx file that corresponds to the preceding code-behind source file. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.Page_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page_Overview/cs/pageexample.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.Page_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page_Overview/vb/pageexample.aspx#1)] 您必須使用指示詞，並使用`Inherits`和`CodeFile`連結至.aspx 檔案的程式碼後置檔案的屬性。You must use the directive and use the `Inherits` and `CodeFile` attributes to link the code-behind file to the .aspx file. 在此範例中，`Inherits`屬性會指出`MyCodeBehind`類別和`CodeFile`屬性會指出包含類別的語言特定檔案的路徑。In this example, the `Inherits` attribute indicates the `MyCodeBehind` class and the `CodeFile` attribute indicates the path to the language-specific file that contains the class. 下列程式碼範例示範單一檔案網頁模型，以及如何存取屬性和屬性。The following code example demonstrates the single-file page model and how to access the property and the property of the . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.Page_Overview2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page_Overview2/cs/pageexample.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.Page_Overview2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page_Overview2/vb/pageexample.aspx#1)]

span.span: Registers beginning and ending event handler delegates that do not require state information for an asynchronous page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，將處理常式加入至非同步網頁。Use the method to add handlers to an asynchronous Web page. 您可以註冊多個非同步處理常式;不過，只有一個處理常式會執行一次。You can register multiple asynchronous handlers; however, only one handler runs at a time. 如果您想要同時處理多個非同步方法，您應該使用單一方法，並啟動該處理常式從多個非同步作業。If you want to process multiple asynchronous methods simultaneously, you should use a single method and launch multiple asynchronous operations from that handler. 非同步處理常式會呼叫之間和事件。The asynchronous handlers are called between the and events. 首先，所有事件 (透過事件) 會執行，然後每個註冊呼叫方法。First, all events (through the event) are run, and then each registered method is called. 處理常式完成時，對應呼叫方法。When the handler completes, the corresponding method is called. 如果有多個非同步處理常式，會呼叫下一個處理常式。If there are multiple asynchronous handlers, the next handler is called. 呼叫已註冊的非同步事件處理常式之後，其餘頁面事件的呼叫時，開頭為事件。After the registered asynchronous event handlers have been called, the rest of the page events are called, beginning with the event. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用非同步要求到顯示中的本機 Web 伺服器的預設頁面的 HTML 原始程式碼控制項。The following code example uses an asynchronous request to display the HTML source code of the local Web server's default page in a control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[PageAddOnPreRenderCompleteAsync#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PageAddOnPreRenderCompleteAsync/CS/pageaddonprerendercompleteasynccs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[PageAddOnPreRenderCompleteAsync#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PageAddOnPreRenderCompleteAsync/VB/pageaddonprerendercompleteasyncvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用新增需要非同步網頁的狀態資訊的處理常式的方法。Use the method to add handlers that require state information to an asynchronous Web page. 傳入的物件`state`參數可以是任何物件，您的應用程式要求中指定的事件處理常式委派之間傳輸資訊`beginHandler`而`endHandler`參數。The object passed in the `state` parameter can be any object that your application requires to transfer information between event handler delegates specified in the `beginHandler` and the `endHandler` parameters. 您可以註冊多個非同步處理常式;不過，只有一個處理常式會執行一次。You can register multiple asynchronous handlers; however, only one handler runs at a time. 如果您想要同時處理多個非同步方法，您應該使用單一方法，並啟動該處理常式從多個非同步作業。If you want to process multiple asynchronous methods simultaneously, you should use a single method and launch multiple asynchronous operations from that handler. 非同步處理常式會呼叫之間和事件。The asynchronous handlers are called between the and events. 首先，所有事件 (透過事件) 會執行，然後每個註冊呼叫方法。First, all events (through the event) are run, and then each registered method is called. 處理常式完成時，對應呼叫方法。When the handler completes, the corresponding method is called. 如果有多個非同步處理常式，會呼叫下一個處理常式。If there are multiple asynchronous handlers, the next handler is called. 呼叫已註冊的非同步事件處理常式之後，其餘頁面事件的呼叫時，開頭為事件。After the registered asynchronous event handlers have been called, the rest of the page events are called, beginning with the event. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用非同步要求到顯示中的本機 Web 伺服器的預設頁面的 HTML 原始程式碼控制項。The following code example uses an asynchronous request to display the HTML source code of the local Web server's default page in a control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將一份檔案，例如目前的頁面組成使用者控制項檔案。The method adds a list of files, such as user control files, that make up the current page. 如果任何這些頁面已經過修改下, 一次要求頁面時，就會編譯整個頁面。If any of these pages is modified, the entire page is compiled the next time it is requested. 此方法支援 .NET Framework 結構而且並非設計直接從程式碼使用。This method supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當設定為`true`，這個屬性可讓頁面以單一執行緒 apartment (STA) 執行緒上執行。When set to `true`, this property allows the page to be executed on a single-threaded apartment (STA) thread. 這可讓呼叫 STA 元件，例如元件與 Visual Basic 6.0 開發頁面。This allows the page to call STA components, such as components developed with Visual Basic 6.0. 將此屬性設定為`true`也可讓頁面以呼叫 COM + 元件，需要存取 unmanaged ASP 內建物件。Setting this property to `true` also allows the page to call COM+ components that require access to the unmanaged ASP built-in objects. 這些都是透過 ASP`ObjectContext`物件或`OnStartPage`方法。These are accessible through the ASP `ObjectContext` object or the `OnStartPage` method. 在大部分情況下，請勿在程式碼中設定這個屬性。In most circumstances, do not set this property in code. 設定`aspcompat`屬性設定為`true`使用.aspx 檔案中的指示詞。Set the `aspcompat` attribute to `true` using the directive in the .aspx file. 當要求網頁時，將屬性設定動態產生的類別。When the page is requested, the dynamically generated class sets the property.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出處理非同步工作時使用的逾時間隔。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the time-out interval used when processing asynchronous tasks.

value.span: A ，其中包含允許的時間間隔的非同步工作完成。

span.span: A that contains the allowed time interval for completion of the asynchronous task.

value.span: 預設時間間隔為 45 秒。

span.span: The default time interval is 45 seconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 非同步網頁的逾時代表頁面將會等候執行非同步工作的時間的量。The asynchronous time-out of the page represents the amount of time that the page will wait to perform asynchronous tasks. 在大部分情況下，請勿在程式碼中設定這個屬性。In most circumstances, do not set this property in code. 設定非同步逾時時間間隔使用的 Web 組態檔，或指示詞中。Set the page asynchronous time-out interval using the of the Web configuration file or in the directive. 頁面指示詞會覆寫設定 頁面的 設定 區段中的值。Values set in the page configuration section are overwritten by the page directive. 定義非同步工作使用類別，並註冊開始、 結束和逾時的處理常式。Define your asynchronous task using the class and register a beginning, an ending, and a time-out handler. 如果指定的時間間隔中未完成的非同步工作，就會叫用的逾時的處理常式。If the asynchronous task does not complete in the time interval specified, the time-out handler will be invoked. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用具有屬性和方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property with the and methods. 請注意，開始、 結束和逾時的處理常式使用。Note the use of beginning, ending, and time-out handlers. 在範例中，為了示範非同步工作超過配置的時間中指定工作的情況下引進假造的延遲屬性。In the example, an artificial delay is introduced to demonstrate the situation of an asynchronous task exceeding the allotted time for the task as specified in the property. 在真實世界案例中，非同步工作可用來執行資料庫呼叫或產生映像，比方說，而逾時的處理常式提供正常降級，如果工作未在指定的時間內執行。In a real-world scenario, an asynchronous task could be used to perform database calls or image generation, for example, and the time-out handler provides graceful degradation if the task is not performed in a specified amount of time. 請注意， page 指示詞中設定屬性。Note that the property is set in the page directive. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout/CS/page_asynctask.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout/vb/page_asynctask.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout/CS/page_asynctask.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout/vb/page_asynctask.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式的物件可讓您儲存和擷取任意資料的後續要求。An application's object allows you to store and retrieve arbitrary data on subsequent requests. 沒有特別相關聯的網頁或使用者工作階段的快取。The cache is not specifically associated with a page or user session. 它是主要用來增強應用程式的效能。It is used primarily to enhance application performance. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 快取應用程式資料](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/206f977d-7860-4d20-bdd5-c3b3d8479f3d(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Caching Application Data](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/206f977d-7860-4d20-bdd5-c3b3d8479f3d(v=vs.100)). 如需有關應用程式快取和頁面輸出快取之間的差異的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 快取概觀](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5ec28012-4972-4dc3-b3e8-9d20401fe11d)。For more information on the difference between application caching and page output caching, see [ASP.NET Caching Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5ec28012-4972-4dc3-b3e8-9d20401fe11d). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會插入到兩個整數的總和物件使用屬性。The following code example inserts the sum of two integers into the object using the property. 然後擷取值，使用方法並將它寫入Web 伺服器控制項。It then retrieves the value using the method and writes it to a Web server control. summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值，可讓您覆寫的瀏覽器功能自動偵測，並指定特定的瀏覽器用戶端的呈現方式。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that allows you to override automatic detection of browser capabilities and to specify how a page is rendered for particular browser clients.

value.span: A ，指定您想要覆寫的瀏覽器功能。

span.span: A that specifies the browser capabilities that you want to override.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您未設定屬性，相關聯的物件屬性會反映用戶端瀏覽器的功能。If you do not set the property, the object associated with the property reflects the capabilities of the client browser. 如果您要設定這個屬性，已停用用戶端瀏覽器偵測和頁面會使用您提供的值 （別名） 相關聯的瀏覽器功能。If you do set this property, client browser detection is disabled and the page will use browser capabilities associated with the value (alias) that you provide. Web 伺服器電腦上的根 Web.config 組態檔會定義下列的預設別名，您可以使用一般的使用者代理字串的簡略形式：The root Web.config configuration file on the Web server computer defines the following default aliases that you can use as shorthand for common user-agent strings: - `uplevel`表示瀏覽器功能相當於 Internet Explorer 6.0。`uplevel`, which specifies browser capabilities equivalent to Internet Explorer 6.0. - `downlevel`表示瀏覽器功能相當於舊的瀏覽器不支援用戶端指令碼。`downlevel`, which specifies browser capabilities equivalent to older browsers that do not support client script. 若要判斷網頁如何運作的瀏覽器已停用的用戶端指令碼中，您可以使用此別名。You can use this alias to determine how Web pages would work in a browser that has client script disabled. 您可以設定以程式設計方式使用這個屬性的別名，或是您可以設定它以宣告方式使用`ClientTarget`指示詞的屬性。You can set the alias programmatically using this property, or you can set it declaratively using the `ClientTarget` attribute of the directive. 您可以定義中的其他別名`clientTarget`應用程式層級 Web.config 檔案區段。You can define additional aliases in the `clientTarget` section of the application-level Web.config file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [clientTarget 項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/17a0fa6e-a065-49cc-b900-ef73eda6a922)。For more information, see [clientTarget Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/17a0fa6e-a065-49cc-b900-ef73eda6a922). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會定義`ie302`別名並包含在其 Web.config 檔案中設定您的應用程式所需的各節。The following code example defines an `ie302` alias and includes sections needed to configure your application in its Web.config file. 使用此別名，您可以設定屬性設`ie302`和自訂專為 Internet Explorer 3.02 和瀏覽器的頁面。Using this alias, you can set the property to `ie302` and customize pages specifically for Internet Explorer 3.02 browsers. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定`Culture`.aspx 檔案中的指示詞中的屬性。Set the `Culture` attribute in the directive in the .aspx file. 當要求網頁時，動態產生的類別會設定這個屬性的值。When the page is requested, the dynamically generated class sets the value of this property. 此外，您可以明確地設定的值屬性以程式設計方式或元素中的 Web.config 檔案。In addition, you can also explicitly set the value of the property programmatically or in the element of the Web.config file. 屬性用來協助將網頁內容當地語系化。The property is used to help localize page content. 您可以將它設定為任何有效的文化特性 id。You can set it to any valid culture ID. 例如，`en-us`文化特性 ID 將頁面設定為美國英文，while`fr`文化特性 ID 設定為法文的頁面。For example, the `en-us` culture ID sets the page to American English, while the `fr` culture ID sets the page to French. 您也可以將值設`auto`這將會執行自動偵測瀏覽器的慣用語言，並將其設定。You can also set the value to `auto` which will perform automatic detection of the browser's preferred language and set it. 自動語言偵測可以採用預設值，例如`auto:en-us`。The automatic language detection can be qualified with a default value such as `auto:en-us`. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱類別概觀。For more information, see the class overview.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出頁面是否驗證回傳和回呼事件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the page validates postback and callback events.

value.span: 如果網頁會驗證回傳和回呼事件;否則， 。預設值是。

span.span: if the page validates postback and callback events; otherwise, .The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為`true`，ASP.NET 驗證控制項的事件來自該控制項所呈現的使用者介面。When the property is set to `true`, ASP.NET validates that a control event originated from the user interface that was rendered by that control. 控制項在呈現期間註冊其事件，並接著會在回傳或回撥處理期間的驗證事件。A control registers its events during rendering and then validates the events during postback or callback handling. 例如，如果清單控制項包含選項、 轉譯頁面時，如果收到回傳要求時指定選項的數字 4 進行編號 1、 2 或 3，ASP.NET 會引發例外狀況。For example, if a list control includes options numbered 1, 2, or 3 when the page is rendered, and if a postback request is received specifying option number 4, ASP.NET raises an exception. 依預設，事件驅動的所有控制項，在 ASP.NET 中都使用這項功能。All event-driven controls in ASP.NET use this feature by default. 如果您撰寫在執行階段變更控制項的用戶端中的用戶端指令碼時，您可能必須使用方法，以避免 false 事件驗證錯誤。If you write client script that changes a control in the client at run time, you might have to use the method in order to avoid false event validation errors. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這項功能可降低未經授權或惡意的回傳要求和回呼的風險。This feature reduces the risk of unauthorized or malicious postback requests and callbacks. 強烈建議您不要停用事件驗證。It is strongly recommended that you do not disable event validation. 您設定屬性，藉由設定`enableEventValidation`指示詞的屬性或`enableEventValidation`Web.config 檔案中項目的屬性。You set the property by setting the `enableEventValidation` attribute of the directive or the `enableEventValidation` attribute of the element in the Web.config file. 如果您在程式碼中設定這個屬性，您必須設定它，才能初始化頁面。If you set this property in code, you must set it before the page is initialized.

exception.span: 在頁面初始化之後，已設定屬性。

span.span: The property was set after the page was initialized.

related.span: 驗證 ASP.NET 控制項

span.span: Validation ASP.NET Controls

span.span: if the page maintains its view state; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需您可能想要停用檢視狀態資訊，請參閱。For information about why you might want to disable view state, see . 即使是`false`，頁面可能會包含隱藏的檢視狀態 欄位，供 ASP.NET 用來偵測回傳。Even if is `false`, the page might contain a hidden view state field that is used by ASP.NET to detect a postback. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定屬性設`false`頁面載入時。The following code example sets the property to `false` when the page is loaded. 這會停用檢視狀態物件，代表儲存既不頁面的檢視狀態資訊也不由頁面所包含的任何控制項。This disables view state for the object, meaning that neither view-state information for the page nor any controls contained by the page are saved. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出 ASP.NET 是否應該檢查訊息驗證碼 (MAC) 頁面的檢視狀態中，從用戶端回傳網頁時。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether ASP.NET should check message authentication codes (MAC) in the page's view state when the page is posted back from the client.

value.span: 如果應該 MAC 檢查和編碼; 的檢視狀態。否則， 。

span.span: if the view state should be MAC checked and encoded; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 檢視狀態 MAC 是頁面的檢視狀態保存至頁面傳送至瀏覽器時隱藏變數的加密的版本。A view-state MAC is an encrypted version of the hidden variable that a page's view state is persisted to when the page is sent to the browser. 當這個屬性設定為`true`，加密的檢視狀態會檢查以確認，它並未遭到破壞與用戶端上。When this property is set to `true`, the encrypted view state is checked to verify that it has not been tampered with on the client. 程式碼中未設定這個屬性。Do not set this property in code. 設定`EnableViewStateMac`屬性使用.aspx 檔案中的指示詞。Set the `EnableViewStateMac` attribute using the directive in the .aspx file. 當要求網頁時，將屬性設定動態產生的類別。When the page is requested, the dynamically generated class sets the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此屬性應該永遠不會設為`false`生產網站中，即使應用程式或頁面不會使用檢視狀態。This attribute should never be set to `false` in a production Web site, even if the application or page does not use view state. 檢視狀態 MAC 可協助確保其他 ASP.NET 函式，除了檢視狀態的安全性。The view state MAC helps ensure the security of other ASP.NET functions in addition to view state.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ExecuteRegisteredAsyncTasks() cil managed

summary.span: 開始非同步工作的執行。

span.span: Starts the execution of an asynchronous task.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 定義非同步工作使用類別。Define an asynchronous task using the class. 工作定義，且已向頁面使用之後方法，可以叫用方法，開始非同步工作。After the task is defined, and is registered with the page using the method, the method can be invoked to begin the asynchronous task. 會自動呼叫方法中的點頁面上，處理任何註冊的非同步工作，如果它們存在時，會叫用非非同步頁面。The method is automatically called at the point in the page processing when any registered asynchronous tasks, if they exist, are invoked for a non-asynchronous page. 這個自動呼叫之前會發生事件。This automatic call to occurs just before the event. 呼叫方法您想要叫用有時自動呼叫此方法以外的工作。Call the method for tasks you want to be invoked at times other than the automatic call to this method. 請注意，只有一次即使將會執行非同步工作可能多次呼叫。Note, asynchronous tasks will be executed only once even though may be called more than once. 屬性在每次呼叫重設方法。The property is reset on every call to the method. 最後一個值叫用之前方法都優先。The last value of the prior to invoking the method takes precedence. 如果非同步工作花費超過，後續的工作期間，會叫用呼叫會立即逾時。If an asynchronous task takes more than the , subsequent tasks invoked during that call are timed out immediately. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用具有屬性和方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property with the and methods. 請注意，開始、 結束和逾時的處理常式使用。Note the use of beginning, ending, and time-out handlers. 在範例中，為了示範非同步工作超過配置的時間中指定工作的情況下引進假造的延遲屬性。In the example, an artificial delay is introduced to demonstrate the situation of an asynchronous task exceeding the allotted time for the task as specified in the property. 在真實世界案例中，非同步工作可用來執行資料庫呼叫或產生映像，比方說，而逾時的處理常式提供正常降級，如果工作未在指定的時間內執行。In a real-world scenario, an asynchronous task could be used to perform database calls or image generation, for example, and the time-out handler provides graceful degradation if the task is not performed in a specified amount of time. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout/CS/page_asynctask.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout/vb/page_asynctask.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout/CS/page_asynctask.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout/vb/page_asynctask.vb#2)]

exception.span: 沒有非同步工作中的例外狀況。

span.span: There is an exception in the asynchronous task.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可用來存取控制其不在執行階段。The method can be used to access a control whose is not available at design time. 該方法會搜尋只有頁面的立即進行，或最上層容器;它會在頁面上所包含的命名容器中的控制項不以遞迴方式搜尋。The method searches only the page's immediate, or top-level, container; it does not recursively search for controls in naming containers contained on the page. 若要存取的次級的命名容器中的控制項，呼叫`FindControl`該容器的方法。To access controls in a subordinate naming container, call the `FindControl` method of that container. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法來找出範本內的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to locate controls inside templates. 在此範例中，兩個控制項定義中，每個會顯示不同的方式，來攔截事件的內中繼器項目範本。In this example, two controls are defined; each shows a different way to catch the event of a inside the repeater item template. remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件會在頁面的初始化階段結束時呼叫。The event is called at the end of the page's initialization stage. 在網頁的生命週期的這個階段，所有宣告都已初始化頁面上的控制項，但尚未填入網頁的狀態。At this stage of the page's life cycle, all declared controls on the page are initialized, but the page's state is not yet populated. 您可以存取伺服器控制項，但它們將不會還包含使用者所傳回的資訊。You can access server controls, but they will not yet contain information returned from the user. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不能從程式碼直接使用。This method is not intended to be used directly from your code. 若要啟用和操作頁面輸出快取，請使用其中一種方式：To enable and manipulate output caching for a page, use one of these approaches: - 設定以宣告方式使用.aspx 檔案中的指示詞的選項。Set options declaratively using the directive in the .aspx file. - 使用的方法和屬性的類別，這由`Response.Cache`網頁的程式碼中的物件。Use the methods and properties of the class, which is exposed by the `Response.Cache` object in the page's code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 快取的 ASP.NET 網頁](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9666a1b-88df-4931-af0b-a754fc65660b(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Caching ASP.NET Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9666a1b-88df-4931-af0b-a754fc65660b(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 提供兩種機制從一頁將控制權傳輸至另一個。ASP.NET provides two mechanisms for transferring control from one page to another. 您可以使用方法傳送處理之間的頁面，或您可以藉由指定的頁面 URL 提出跨網頁要求實作按鈕控制項的屬性介面。You can use the method to transfer processing between pages, or you can make a cross-page request by assigning a page URL to the property of a button control that implements the interface. 在任一情況下，頁面屬性會包含物件，表示上一個 」 或 「 訂閱者 頁面。In either case, the page property will contain an object that represents the previous or originator page. 如果頁面的比方說，會張貼到頁面乙，頁面的屬性 (可透過存取屬性) 會`true`和頁面 B屬性會有頁面 a 的名稱If, for example, Page A posts to Page B, Page A's property (accessible through the property) will be `true` and Page B's property will have the name of Page A.

ASP.NET 包含的兩個下階類別，包含在 ASP.NET 頁面中，隱藏欄位中儲存狀態資訊的類別和儲存狀態中的類別與相關聯的物件要求。ASP.NET includes two descendents of the class, the class that saves state information in a hidden field included in the ASP.NET page, and the class that saves state in the object associated with the request. 若要將狀態儲存在您選擇的位置，您應該建立新的子系儲存及載入至持續性媒體狀態，您選擇的類別。To save state in the location of your choice, you should create a new descendent of the class that saves and loads state to the persistence medium of your choice. 如需建立新的範例資訊，請參閱類別。For an example of creating a new object, see the class. 如果您使用.NET Framework 版本為 1.0 或 1.1，覆寫這個方法，如果您想要載入從隱藏的欄位以外的任何狀態。If you are using the .NET Framework version 1.0 or 1.1, override this method if you want to load the state from anything other than a hidden field. 如果您選擇這樣做，您也必須覆寫方法。If you choose to do so, you must also override the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks HTML`meta`項目可用來改善搜尋引擎的清單。HTML `meta` elements can be used to improve search-engine listings. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會執行初始設定和安裝所需的步驟來建立執行個體。The method performs the initialization and setup steps required to create a instance. 在這個階段中網頁的生命週期中，宣告的伺服器控制項在頁面上會初始化為其預設狀態;不過，每個控制項的檢視狀態尚未填入。In this stage of the page's life cycle, declared server controls on the page are initialized to their default state; however, the view state of each control is not yet populated. 頁面上的控制項無法存取其他伺服器控制項在頁面上的`Page_Init`階段中的，不論其他控制項是子系或父控制項。A control on the page cannot access other server controls on the page during the `Page_Init` phase, regardless of whether the other controls are child or parent controls. 其他伺服器控制項不保證會建立且可供存取。Other server controls are not guaranteed to be created and ready for access. 方法之後呼叫方法，以及之前方法。The method is called after the method and before the method. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回特定物件，可修改要求的瀏覽器的物件。The property returns the specific object that modifies the behavior of the object for the requesting browser. 特定物件會檢查傳入的特性來判斷物件。The specific object is determined by examining characteristics of the incoming object. 當配接器會針對任何生命週期事件的要求上選擇物件上覆寫對應的事件物件。When an adapter is chosen for the request, any life cycle events on the object override the corresponding events on the object.

summary.span: 取得與頁面關聯的物件。

span.span: Gets the object associated with the page.

value.span: A與頁面相關聯。

span.span: A associated with the page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks HTTP 要求和回應是原本就是無狀態。HTTP requests and responses are inherently stateless. 若要維護之間的 HTTP 要求的狀態，可以儲存 ASP.NET 伺服器頁面狀態。To maintain state between HTTP requests, ASP.NET server pages can store state. 此狀態下，稱為檢視狀態，是由頁面和控制項設定和資料，讓頁面顯示如同它們是相同的使用者所看到，和最後一個以為頁面互動的控制項所組成。This state, called view state, consists of page and control settings and data that make the page and controls appear as if they are the same ones that the user saw and interacted with on their last round trip to the page. 若要儲存檢視狀態，對相同頁面的連續要求之間有多個機制。Several mechanisms exist to store view state between successive requests to the same page. 抽象類別代表這些狀態的儲存機制的基底類別。The abstract class represents the base class for these state storage mechanisms. 網頁程式開發人員通常不需要使用屬性。Page developers will typically not need to use the property. 屬性主要由控制項開發人員擴充功能的類別。The property is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the class.

summary.span: 字串，定義呈現頁面中的 EVENTARGUMENT 隱藏的欄位。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event PreInit As EventHandler

summary.span: 在頁面初始化之前發生。

span.span: Occurs before page initialization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件可讓您檢查頁面要求，例如是否載入網頁回傳的回應中的條件。This event enables you to check conditions of the page request, such as whether the page is being loaded in response to a postback. 您也可以檢查設定檔屬性的值。You can also check the values of profile properties. 事件可讓您設定值，可稍後在頁面生命週期。The event enables you to set values that are used later in the page life cycle. 您可以動態設定主版頁面或所要求的頁面、 佈景主題和建立動態控制項。You can dynamically set a master page or a theme for the requested page, and create dynamic controls. 如需有關如何融入 ASP.NET 生命週期的事件，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 網頁生命週期概觀](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7949d756-1a79-464e-891f-904b1cfc7991)。For more information about how the event fits into the ASP.NET life cycle, see [ASP.NET Page Life Cycle Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7949d756-1a79-464e-891f-904b1cfc7991).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有回傳資料處理之後，以及之前，就會引發事件事件。The event is raised after all postback data processing and before the event. 第二個嘗試載入回傳資料會在之前事件。There is a second attempt to load postback data before the event. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event PreRenderComplete As EventHandler

summary.span: 在呈現頁面內容之前發生。

span.span: Occurs before the page content is rendered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 網頁生命週期的呈現前階段完成時，會引發事件。The event is raised when the pre-render stage of the page life cycle is complete. 在頁面生命週期的這個階段，建立所有的控制項、 完成任何所需的分頁，而該頁面已準備好要呈現給輸出。At this stage of the page life cycle, all controls are created, any pagination required is completed, and the page is ready to render to the output. 這是頁面的檢視狀態儲存之前，所引發的最後一個事件。This is the last event raised before the page's view state is saved. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您使用原始頁面方法或使用跨網頁公佈到從一個 ASP.NET 網頁的處理傳輸到另一個，包含可能需要的 [目的地] 頁面的要求資訊。When you use the method or use cross-page posting to transfer processing from one ASP.NET page to another, the originating page contains request information that might be required for the destination page. 您可以使用屬性來存取該資訊。You can use the property to access that information. 如果目前的頁面正在直接要求 （不轉移或從另一頁的轉錄文章） 的結果呈現屬性包含`null`。If the current page is being rendered as a result of a direct request (not a transfer or cross-post from another page), the property contains `null`. ## Examples 下列範例是在兩個部分。The following example is in two parts. 第一種是使用 ASP.NET 網頁方法，做為頁面模型中公開`Server.Transfer("path")`。The first is an ASP.NET page that uses the method, exposed in the page model as `Server.Transfer("path")`. 第二個部分是 [目標] 頁面，使用屬性來取得第一頁的標題。The second part is the target page, which uses the property to get the title of the first page. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.Page.PreviousPage#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page.PreviousPage/CS/Main.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.Page.PreviousPage#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page.PreviousPage/VB/Main.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.Page.PreviousPage#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page.PreviousPage/CS/Notify.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.Page.PreviousPage#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page.PreviousPage/VB/Notify.aspx#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可供指令碼為基礎的控制項，如此用戶端指令碼程式庫能與相同類型的所有控制項陣列中宣告本身。This method can be used by script-based controls to declare themselves within an array so that a client script library can work with all the controls of the same type. 方法已被取代。The method has been deprecated. 使用方法中的類別。Use the method in the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用方法，以將陣列中，宣告`myArray`，，其中包含三個名為的物件`x`， `y`，和`z`。The following code example uses the method to declare an array, `myArray`, that contains three objects named `x`, `y`, and `z`. 此範例定義，並註冊啟動指令碼使用方法。The example defines and registers a startup script using the method. 當 ECMAScript`doClick`函式由包含此程式碼的頁面呼叫、 陣列和其物件會初始化。When the ECMAScript `doClick` function is called from the page that contains this code, the array and its objects are initialized. span.span: A that defines the asynchronous task.

summary.span: 向頁面註冊新的非同步工作。

span.span: Registers a new asynchronous task with the page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 定義非同步工作使用類別。Define an asynchronous task using the class. 定義工作時，使用向頁面註冊工作的方法。When the task is defined, use the method to register the task with the page. 在註冊之後的工作，叫用方法開始非同步工作。After registering the task, invoke the method to begin the asynchronous task. 方法可以搭配同步和非同步頁面。The method can be used with both synchronous and asynchronous pages. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用具有屬性和方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property with the and methods. 請注意，開始、 結束和逾時的處理常式使用。Note the use of beginning, ending, and time-out handlers. 在範例中，為了示範非同步工作超過配置的時間中指定工作的情況下引進假造的延遲屬性。In the example, an artificial delay is introduced to demonstrate the situation of an asynchronous task exceeding the allotted time for the task as specified in the property. 在真實世界案例中，非同步工作可用來執行資料庫呼叫或產生映像，比方說，而逾時的處理常式提供正常降級，如果工作未在指定的時間內執行。In a real-world scenario, an asynchronous task could be used to perform database calls or image generation, for example, and the time-out handler provides graceful degradation if the task is not performed in a specified amount of time. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout/CS/page_asynctask.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout/vb/page_asynctask.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout/CS/page_asynctask.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout/vb/page_asynctask.vb#2)]

ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 要註冊的控制項必須實作介面或，就會引發。The control to be registered must implement the interface or an is raised. 由控制項，實作時的回傳資料處理和引發的任何文章的介面可讓備份資料已變更事件。When implemented by a control, the interface enables handling of post back data and raising of any post back data changed events. 如需有關伺服器控制項的事件模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 伺服器控制項事件模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6304bff7-1b0e-4641-8acb-6d3b0badc4a3)。For more information on the server control event model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Server Control Event Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6304bff7-1b0e-4641-8acb-6d3b0badc4a3). 當時或之前的頁面註冊控制項`Page_PreRender`頁面生命週期的事件。Register controls with the page at or before the `Page_PreRender` event of the page life cycle. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用方法來要求文字方塊控制項， `myTextBox`、 要張貼上一步，然後才能執行 文字 方塊相關聯的任何程式碼。The following code example uses the method to require a text box control, `myTextBox`, to be posted back before any code associated with the text box can execute. 控制項實作介面。 controls implement the interface. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). summary.span: 為一個需要處理控制項上時引發的事件註冊 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項物件。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有一部伺服器控制項註冊每個頁面要求。Only one server control can be registered per page request. 控制項不包含其識別碼在表單中的回傳資料的控制項時，必須使用。The must be used when the control does not include its control ID in the form post data. 此外，已註冊的控制項必須實作介面。Also, the control that is registered must implement the interface. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用方法，以註冊Web 伺服器控制項，為需要引發事件。The following code example uses the method to register a Web server control as requiring an event to be raised. 註冊第一個之後控制項，您可能會造成第二個張貼的第一個按鈕的結果程式碼中宣告的控制項 click 至頁面的事件。After you have registered the first control, you can cause the second control declared in the code to post the results of the first button's click event to the page. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果頁面正在執行以回應要求，透過 ASP.NET 路由中，這個屬性會提供存取權已傳遞為路由資料的 URL 參數值。If a page is running in response to a request made through ASP.NET routing, this property provides access to the URL parameter values that were passed as route data. 如果實體的 url，而不是路由 URL 的回應中執行網頁時，這個屬性是`null`。If the page runs in response to a physical URL instead of a route URL, this property is `null`. 下列範例示範如何擷取名為 URL 參數的值`year`。The following example shows how to extract the value of a URL parameter that is named `year`. ```vb Dim year As Integer = Convert.ToInt32(Page.RouteData.Values("year")) ``` ```csharp int year = Convert.ToInt32(Page.RouteData.Values["year"]) ``` 如果使用的 URL 模式來定義的路由`{locale}/{year}`網域`contoso.com`，以及要求的 URL 是否`contoso.com/US/2010`，`year`會包含值 「 2010 」 執行此程式碼。If the route is defined by using the URL pattern `{locale}/{year}` for the domain `contoso.com`, and if the requested URL is `contoso.com/US/2010`, `year` will contain the value "2010" when this code runs. 如需有關 ASP.NET 路由的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 路由](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/892441af-8f1d-483e-ab5f-b82c23576f5a)。For more information about ASP.NET routing, see [ASP.NET Routing](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/892441af-8f1d-483e-ab5f-b82c23576f5a).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會使用方法所參考物件屬性來儲存頁面的檢視狀態和控制項狀態資訊。The method uses the method of the object referenced by the property to store view-state and control-state information for the page. ASP.NET 包含的兩個下階類別，包含在 ASP.NET 頁面中，隱藏欄位中儲存狀態資訊的類別和儲存狀態中的類別與相關聯的物件要求。ASP.NET includes two descendents of the class, the class that saves state information in a hidden field included in the ASP.NET page, and the class that saves state in the object associated with the request. 請注意，當使用隱藏的 VIEWSTATE 欄位仍轉譯，這用來判斷回傳的類別。Note that when using the class the hidden VIEWSTATE field is still rendered as this is used to determine post back. 若要將狀態儲存在您選擇的位置，您應該建立新的子系儲存及載入至持續性媒體狀態，您選擇的類別。To save state in the location of your choice, you should create a new descendent of the class that saves and loads state to the persistence medium of your choice. 如需建立新的範例資訊，請參閱類別。For an example of creating a new object, see the class. 如果您使用.NET Framework 版本為 1.0 或 1.1，覆寫這個方法，如果您想要儲存狀態中的隱藏欄位以外的任何項目。If you are using the .NET Framework version 1.0 or 1.1, override this method if you want to save the state in anything other than a hidden field. 如果您選擇這樣做，您也必須覆寫方法。If you choose to do so, you must also override the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在網頁上的控制項狀態資訊儲存之後事件。State information for controls on the Web page is saved after the event. 的檢視狀態和頁面控制項狀態之後，就會引發事件和頁面上的控制項儲存至持續性媒體。The event is raised after the view state and control state of the page and controls on the page are saved to the persistence medium. 這是之前要求的瀏覽器來呈現網頁時引發的最後一個事件。This is the last event raised before the page is rendered to the requesting browser. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會提供目前要求的工作階段的相關資訊。This property provides information about the current request's session. A`Session`物件保留在每個要求的頁面或文件中 ASP.NET 應用程式的使用者。A `Session` object is maintained for each user that requests a page or document from an ASP.NET application. 變數會儲存在`Session`物件不會捨棄，當使用者將頁面從應用程式中; 相反地，這些變數保存，只要使用者存取您的應用程式中的頁面。Variables stored in the `Session` object are not discarded when the user moves from page to page in the application; instead, these variables persist as long as the user is accessing pages in your application. 如需有關工作階段狀態的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 工作階段狀態概觀](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d60d381-6521-4e1d-9089-da6464f2a9bc)。For more information about session state, see [ASP.NET Session State Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d60d381-6521-4e1d-9089-da6464f2a9bc). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立`GetStyle`函式可擷取儲存在 Web Form 網頁的工作階段狀態中的索引鍵，並將該值轉換為字串。The following code example creates a `GetStyle` function that retrieves a key stored in the session state of the Web Forms page and converts its value to a string. [!code-csharp[Page.Session_Samples1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Page.Session_Samples1/CS/sessioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[Page.Session_Samples1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Page.Session_Samples1/VB/sessionvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用表示指定的控制項設為作用中的控制項，顯示在瀏覽器的網頁上的方法。Use the method to make the specified control the active control on the Web page displayed by the browser. 當準備好要呈現給用戶端之前，必須呼叫方法事件。The method must be called before the page is prepared for rendering to the client in the event. > [!NOTE] > 方法將只在瀏覽器支援的 ECMAScript 版本 1.3 或更新版本上運作。The method will work only on browsers supporting ECMAScript version 1.3 or later. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定在網頁上到第二個文字方塊中的焦點。The following code example sets the focus to the second text box on a Web page. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 在大部分情況下，請勿在程式碼中設定這個屬性。In most circumstances, do not set this property in code. 設定`SmartNavigation`屬性設定為`true`.aspx 檔案中的指示詞中。Set the `SmartNavigation` attribute to `true` in the directive in the .aspx file. 當要求網頁時，動態產生的類別會設定這個屬性。When the page is requested, the dynamically generated class sets this property. > [!NOTE] > 在 ASP.NET 2.0 版中，屬性已被取代。In ASP.NET version 2.0, the property is deprecated. 使用方法和屬性改為。Use the method and the property instead. Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.5 瀏覽器中或更新版本中，智慧型巡覽所要求頁面時執行下列加強網頁的使用者體驗：When a page is requested by Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.5 browser, or later, smart navigation enhances the user's experience of the page by performing the following: - 排除導覽所造成的閃爍顯示。Eliminating the flash caused by navigation. - 移動 頁面時，保存捲軸位置。Persisting the scroll position when moving from page to page. - 保存的項目焦點之間巡覽。Persisting element focus between navigations. - 保留在瀏覽器的歷程記錄只有最後一個頁面狀態。Retaining only the last page state in the browser's history. 適合在使用需要經常回傳的 ASP.NET 網頁，但不會變更大幅在傳回的視覺內容，會使用智慧型巡覽。Smart navigation is best used with ASP.NET pages that require frequent postbacks but with visual content that does not change dramatically on return. 請仔細考慮這在決定要將此屬性設定為`true`。Consider this carefully when deciding whether to set this property to `true`.

span.span: The name of the theme that is applied to the page early in the page life cycle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性不是指直接階層式樣式表 (CSS)。This property does not refer directly to a cascading style sheet (CSS). 屬性包含 ASP.NET 主題，其中可以包括其內的 CSS 檔案的名稱。The property contains the name of an ASP.NET theme, which can include CSS files within it. 屬性會指定在頁面生命週期早期套用至頁面的佈景主題的名稱，而屬性會指定在網頁生命週期的稍後套用至頁面的佈景主題的名稱。The property specifies the name of a theme that is applied to a page early in the page life cycle, whereas the property specifies the name of a theme that is applied to a page later in the page life cycle. 這表示，在頁面上的設定值優先於樣式表主題中的設定。This means that settings on the page take precedence over settings in the style sheet theme. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). 在 page 指示詞，或藉由覆寫屬性中，通常會設定這個屬性的值。You typically set a value for this property in the page directive or by overriding the property. 資訊，請參閱下列主題：For information, see the following topics: - [如何：適用於 ASP.NET 佈景主題](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9d72364-4d77-4b73-84be-7630dc63e0fe(v=vs.100))[How to: Apply ASP.NET Themes](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9d72364-4d77-4b73-84be-7630dc63e0fe(v=vs.100)) - [如何：以程式設計方式套用 ASP.NET 佈景主題](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/02eed7c3-01e8-4e20-8358-df47dbd4f148))[How to: Apply ASP.NET Themes Programmatically](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/02eed7c3-01e8-4e20-8358-df47dbd4f148))

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性設定的頁面所用的佈景主題名稱。The property sets the name of the theme used for the page. 如果您想要優先於佈景主題中的設定的設定頁面上，使用屬性。If you want the settings on the page to take precedence over the settings in the theme, use the property. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). 屬性必須設定之前事件; 設定屬性後的事件會導致例外狀況。The property must be set prior to the event; setting the property after the event will cause an exception. 指定的佈景主題必須存在於應用程式或通用的佈景主題。The specified theme must exist as either an application or a global theme. 如果主題不存在，擲回例外狀況。If the theme does not exist, an exception is thrown. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將屬性設為名稱的字串中傳遞查詢。The following code example sets the property to a name passed in the query string. summary.span: 取得目前 Web 要求的 物件。

span.span: Gets the object for the current Web request.

value.span: 從資料目前 Web 要求的物件。

span.span: Data from the object for the current Web request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 追蹤會追蹤，並提供關於 Web 要求的執行詳細資料。Tracing tracks and presents the execution details about a Web request. 在呈現的網頁中顯示的追蹤資料，您必須啟用網頁或應用程式層級的追蹤。For trace data to be visible in a rendered page, you must enable tracing at the page or application level. 預設會停用頁面上的追蹤。Tracing on a page is disabled by default. 若要啟用頁面的追蹤，請使用指示詞`<% @ Page trace="true" %>`。To enable tracing for a page, use the directive `<% @ Page trace="true" %>`. 若要啟用整個應用程式的追蹤，您必須在應用程式的組態檔，位於應用程式的根目錄的 Web.config 中啟用它。To enable tracing for an entire application, you must enable it in the application's configuration file, Web.config, which resides in the root directory of the application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 追蹤概觀](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1552561d-887c-4002-8770-f92662cdf416)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Tracing Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1552561d-887c-4002-8770-f92662cdf416). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何存取屬性和方法，透過屬性。The following code example demonstrates accessing the property and the method through the property. 此程式碼會呼叫方法只有在追蹤時，才會啟用物件。This code calls the method only when tracing is enabled for the object. 如果未啟用，此程式碼不會執行，可協助減少您的應用程式的額外負荷。If it is not enabled, this code will not run, which can help reduce overhead for your application. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Page.Trace#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page.Trace/CS/trace1cs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Page.Trace#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page.Trace/VB/trace1vb.aspx#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者按一下有任何 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項，這個方法會叫用`CausesValidation`屬性設定為`true`，這是預設值。This method is invoked when a user clicks any ASP.NET server control that has the `CausesValidation` property set to `true`, which is the default. 其中包括， ，並Web 伺服器控制項， ，和HTML 伺服器控制項和控制項，可以自動回傳至伺服器，例如， ， ，和控制項。These include the , , and Web server controls, the , , and HTML server controls, and controls that can automatically post back to the server such as the , , , and controls. 若要停用任何頁面上的按鈕控制項的驗證，將按鈕控制項的`CausesValidation`屬性設`false`。To disable validation for any button control on the page, set the button control's `CausesValidation` property to `false`. 叫用這個方法時，它會逐一包含在驗證控制項相關聯的物件屬性，並叫用目前的驗證群組中每個驗證控制項的驗證邏輯。When this method is invoked, it iterates through the validation controls contained in the object associated with the property and invokes the validation logic for each validation control in the current validation group. 驗證群組取決於公佈到伺服器 頁面的控制項。The validation group is determined by the control that posted the page to the server. 如果驗證未不指定任何群組，則會不使用任何驗證群組。If no validation group is specified, then no validation group is used. > [!NOTE] > 頁面驗證的行為已變更。The behavior of page validation has changed. 在 [!INCLUDE[vstecasplong](~/includes/vstecasplong-md.md)]，控制項不再呼叫方法，它們使用方法改為。In [!INCLUDE[vstecasplong](~/includes/vstecasplong-md.md)], controls no longer call the method; they use the method instead. 如果您使用方法[!INCLUDE[vstecasplong](~/includes/vstecasplong-md.md)] 頁面上，驗證群組會忽略，且會驗證所有的控制項。If you use the method on an [!INCLUDE[vstecasplong](~/includes/vstecasplong-md.md)] page, validation groups are ignored and all controls are validated. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會呼叫定義數個不同的驗證群組的案例中的頁面上的方法。The following code example calls the method on a page in a scenario with several different validation groups defined. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format:
## Remarks 必須是內部的控制項`
`標記之前它們轉譯，讓它們被放外部標籤顯示錯誤訊息，可以呼叫這個方法。Controls that are required to be inside `` tags can call this method before they render so that an error message is shown if they are placed outside the tags. 回傳或取決於已註冊的指令碼區塊的控制項應該呼叫這個方法的覆寫中方法。Controls that post back or depend on registered script blocks should call this method in an override of the method. 具有不同的方式呈現伺服器表單項目頁面，可以覆寫此方法會擲回的例外狀況，在不同情況下。Pages that have a different way of rendering the server form element can override this method to throw an exception under different conditions. 如果不放在伺服器控制項的回傳，或使用用戶端指令碼將無法運作伺服器控制項 (<`form runat="server">`) 標記。Server controls that post back or use client-side script will not work if they are not enclosed in the server control (<`form runat="server">`) tags. 這些控制項可以呼叫這個方法，其提供明確的錯誤訊息，當不放在轉譯時控制項。These controls can call this method when they render to provide a clear error message when they are not enclosed in the control. 當您開發的自訂伺服器控制項時，通常會呼叫這個方法，當您覆寫`Render`為任何種類的輸入標記的方法。When you develop a custom server control, it is common to call this method when you override the `Render` method for any kind of input tag. 這是特別重要，如果輸入的控制項會呼叫，則它會發出用戶端指令碼。This is particularly important if the input control calls , or if it emits client script. 複合的伺服器控制項不需要進行此呼叫。A composite server control does not need to make this call. ## Examples 下列程式碼會覆寫自訂伺服器控制項的方法。The following code example overrides the method of a custom server control. 當這個控制項將其內容寫入頁面時，它會使用方法以確定控制項顯示的開頭和結尾標記之間控制項。When this control writes its content to a page, it uses the method to make sure that the control appears between the opening and closing tags of an control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定屬性可協助您避免在您的應用程式，避免惡意使用者攻擊。Setting the property can help you prevent attacks on your application from malicious users. 它會讓您指派給個別使用者的檢視狀態變數的識別項，使其無法使用變數來產生攻擊。It does this by allowing you to assign an identifier to the view-state variable for individual users so that they cannot use the variable to generate an attack. 如需有關 Web 攻擊以及您可以如何協助防止它們的詳細資訊，請參閱[採取善用 ASP.NET 內建功能來擊退 Web 攻擊](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=163557)。For more information about Web attacks and about what you can do to help prevent them, see [Take Advantage of ASP.NET Built-in Features to Fend Off Web Attacks](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=163557). 您可以為任何字串值，設定此屬性，例如使用者的已驗證的名稱或值。You can set this property to any string value, such as the user's authenticated name or the value. > [!NOTE] > 您必須設定這個屬性期間`Page_Init`頁面處理階段。You must set this property during the `Page_Init` phase of page processing. 設定這個屬性期間`Page_Load`階段會擲回的例外狀況。Setting this property during the `Page_Load` phase throws an exception.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會設定屬性設`false`隱藏頁面的呈現的內容。The following example sets the property to `false` to hide the rendered content of a page. 此頁面第一次要求時，資料來源是填入，並顯示在頁面。When this page is first requested, a data source is populated and displayed in the page. 當使用者按一下按鈕，`HideButton_Click`事件處理常式會隱藏整份轉譯網頁的內容。When a user clicks the button, the `HideButton_Click` event handler hides the entire rendered content of the page.
